original_text: And Joseph said to his brothers, “I am Joseph! Is my father still alive?” But his brothers could not answer him, for they were dismayed at his presence.
korean_text: 요셉이 그 형들에게 이르되 나는 요셉이라 내 아버지께서 아직 살아 계시니이까 형들이 그 앞에서 놀라서 대답하지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: And Joseph said to his brothers
But his brothers could not answer him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 형들은 그에게 대답할 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: for they were dismayed at his presence
